statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT timestamp, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading > 100
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT MAX(energy_reading) AS max_energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT energy_reading, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT MAX(energy_reading) AS max_energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT timestamp, AVG(energy_reading) AS average_energy FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_reading > 100 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 5
SELECT timestamp, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY energy_reading DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageTrends WHERE date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT id, trend_analysis FROM EnergyUsageTrends WHERE energy_saved < 0;
SELECT date, time, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT id, date, time, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, time, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY date, time HAVING AVG(energy_consumed) > 50 ORDER BY avg_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT date, SUM(energy_saved) AS total_energy_saved FROM EnergyUsageTrends WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, energy_saved, trend_analysis FROM EnergyUsageTrends WHERE energy_saved BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY energy_saved ASC, id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT id, date, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed < 50 UNION SELECT id, date, energy_saved AS energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsageTrends WHERE energy_saved > 20 ORDER BY date, energy_consumed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100
SELECT timestamp, device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_name, location FROM Devices WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY device_id
SELECT trend_type, trend_description FROM EnergyUsageTrends
SELECT device_name, location FROM Devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM Devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_name, location FROM Devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT timestamp, device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsageTrends WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'smart_meter';
SELECT home_id, address, owner_name FROM homes ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM energy_usage_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'smart meter';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT address, owner_name FROM homes WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY home_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_usage > 5 ORDER BY total_usage DESC;

SELECT e.analysis_id, e.timestamp, ea.analysis_result FROM energy_usage_analysis e JOIN energy_consumption_data ec ON e.timestamp = ec.timestamp WHERE ec.energy_consumed < 50 ORDER BY e.analysis_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_history;
SELECT usage_kwh, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_name, appliance_name FROM rooms INNER JOIN appliances ON rooms.room_id = appliances.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM device_status WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT room_name, SUM(usage_kwh) AS total_usage FROM rooms INNER JOIN energy_consumption_history ON rooms.room_id = energy_consumption_history.room_id GROUP BY room_name;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_history WHERE usage_kwh > 100 AND appliance_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT AVG(usage_kwh) AS average_usage, category_name FROM energy_consumption_history JOIN appliances ON energy_consumption_history.appliance_id = appliances.appliance_id JOIN energy_categories ON appliances.category = energy_categories.category_name GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT room_name, COUNT(appliance_id) AS num_appliances FROM rooms LEFT JOIN energy_consumption_history ON rooms.room_id = energy_consumption_history.room_id GROUP BY room_name ORDER BY num_appliances DESC;

SELECT appliance_name, SUM(usage_kwh) AS total_usage FROM appliances JOIN energy_consumption_history ON appliances.appliance_id = energy_consumption_history.appliance_id GROUP BY appliance_name HAVING total_usage > 500;
SELECT SUM(usage_kwh) AS total_usage, DATE(timestamp) AS date_only FROM energy_consumption_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY date_only ORDER BY date_only ASC;
